Prompt:

A pfsportskit for basketball, displayed in two cleanly aligned angles: front view (left) and back view (right), against a crisp white studio background. The basketball jersey and shorts are presented in a floating, mannequin-free layout, suitable for high-end product catalog visuals. Both views are perfectly centered, evenly spaced, and fully visible. No cleats, socks, or models ‚Äî just the uniform, front and back.

‚∏ª

üßç‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Garment Structure

The kit consists of a short basketball jersey and tapered mid-thigh athletic shorts. The jersey features a crew, angular shoulder seams, and a form-fitting streamlined cut through the torso. The shorts include sculpted side panels, a reinforced waistband, and slit hems for dynamic movement.

‚∏ª

üßµ Fabric & Texture

Constructed from a dual-zone poly-elastane blend, the jersey incorporates diamond-knit mesh on the torso and smooth matte spandex sleeves. Side panels are embedded with vented hex-weave textures. The material has a low-luster finish, designed to reflect controlled lighting and rich color. Seams are bonded and flatlocked, with detail piping following panel boundaries.

‚∏ª

üé® Color Scheme
        ‚Ä¢ Primary Color: custom #9900ff shade
        ‚Ä¢ Secondary Color: crimson red
        ‚Ä¢ Accent: Ice white trim and dark contours

‚∏ª

üé® Design Language

The front of the jersey features an elegant yet modern solid pattern, radiating outward from the chest center in crimson red, resembling a digital emblem. Thin contour lines wrap along the ribs and upper chest in a tech-geometry. A sharp white slash element cuts diagonally across the midsection, forming a bold angle that intersects the main motif. Sleeve cuffs are trimmed in crimson red with subtle dotted patterns near the hem.

The back of the jersey includes a crimson red vertical spine pattern, composed of interlocking bands. The player name is positioned just below the collar in clean uppercase text, with the number centered mid-back in large crimson red numerals outlined in white. A deep custom #9900ff shade halo gradient behind the number adds tonal contrast.

‚∏ª

ü©≥ Shorts Design

Shorts are custom #9900ff shade with angular crimson red side panels, shaped like descending wedges that taper toward the knee. A thin white trim outlines the bottom hem and side slits. Rear panel shaping follows the glute contour with internal stitching and a slight back yoke drop. The left thigh displays a crimson red team crest; the right thigh features an optional player number or minimal icon.
